channel.title: Y0u g0t pk3d's official development/help topic!
channel.description:
[i]Welcome to y0u g0t pk3d's help topic for servers and dev. Please follow the rules of moparscape and I will not have a problem with helping you. Also if you are not online I will provide help whenever you are. Mods do not lock this topic. I understand this seems a bit weird but let it slide.
- What not to post here - [*]Anything inappropriate [*]Anything not following the rules [*]DO NOT SAY "first post, second, etc." [*]Have fun I will help for almost anything. - My status: Online - - Reply by: 3-4 minutes max - - MSN: My msn if you need 1 on 1 chat: dickey_alex20@hotmail.com -
Let the topics begin. [/i]

item.title: Y0u g0t pk3d's official development/help topic!
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

so i am noob, that will make it so u have to be 99 of the skill i enter to wear the cape id i enter? umm also why is there a 3 after the remove equipment? cape is equipment number 1 right?..

Read full topic

item.title: Y0u g0t pk3d's official development/help topic!
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

[quote=“a pirate, post:11, topic:78829”]hi i got a download and hamachi how i use the download 4 a scorce on hamachi plz pm me[/quote] wow wtf o.O all you do is extract the source from win.rar, then edit compile.bat with perfect compiler 1.7, then you use the hamachi ip which is at the top of the hamachi window in big white text. that is what you enter in the server ip on the client. l0l

Read full topic

item.title: Y0u g0t pk3d's official development/help topic!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == CAPEIDHERE == true){ //coded by i am noob
if(playerLevel[LVLIDHERE] <= 98) { // one less so if your 98 or lower u cant wear.
remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], 3);
sendMessage("You Do Not Have The Right Level For This Cape");
}

< = Less Then

= Greater Then

Here Ya Go LeScapePK , Just add This Under UR Public Boolean Proc

Read full topic

item.title: Y0u g0t pk3d's official development/help topic!
item.dc:creator: @y0u_g0t_pk3d y0u g0t pk3d
item.description:
@y0u_g0t_pk3d wrote:

[quote=“LeScape Pk, post:2, topic:78829”]alright, i just wanna know a few things

-how would i make items require levels? i.e. red fremmenik requiring 99 strength:

Search for in client:

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 5;

you could press enter and add:

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("THENAMEHERE")) { return thedeflvlreq;

-chich color represents defense more, (purple\teal):

??

-how do i edit the damage a cbow does? thanks:

There is no editing of range damage

-does ANY server have actual skill capes? is there a tut out there? :S:

NO. NOT: actual[/quote]

Read full topic
